desc: In 1978, Mike Arensdorf started producing his line of M.A. Scale Models. In the last 19 years our 1:43 scale model car line has grown to 434 - 1/43 scale models. Mike is always working on new kits of different cars for release. We have customers all over the world and are always excited to gain new customers.Mike also

layout.text: Porsche, Toyota, Nissan, Chevrolet, plus many classic and modern IMSA cars.
